name: crewtimer_video_recorder
description: A node electron utility to write mp4 files for CrewTimer Connect

scripts.build-ffmpeg-mac: git clone https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg.git && cd FFmpeg && ./configure --prefix=../src/ffmpeg-built-mac --enable-static --enable-gpl --disable-network --disable-programs --disable-doc --disable-avdevice --disable-swresample --disable-postproc --disable-avfilter && make && make install
scripts.build-ffmpeg-win: git clone https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg.git && cd FFmpeg && ./configure --prefix=../src/ffmpeg-built-win --enable-static --enable-gpl --disable-network --disable-programs --disable-doc --disable-avdevice --disable-swresample --disable-postproc --disable-avfilter --toolchain=msvc && make && make install
scripts.install-ffmpeg-win: git clone https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg.git --config core.autocrlf=false && cd FFmpeg && ./configure --prefix=./ffmpeg-built-win --enable-gpl && make && make install
scripts.install-ffmpeg-mac: git clone https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg.git && cd FFmpeg && ./configure --prefix=./ffmpeg-built-mac --enable-gpl && make && make install
scripts.install-ffmpeg: node -e "require('os').platform() === 'darwin' ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run install-ffmpeg-mac') : require('os').platform() === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run install-ffmpeg-win') : console.log('Unsupported OS')"

author: Glenn Engel (glenne)
